attributes.action: Give more financial help to middle income families who cant afford to have more than one child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More financial help should be provided to working parents who are on a low to middle income, to be able to have more than one child. Currently families must wait until the youngest child is out of nursery care, before being able to afford to place another child into nursery care.
